short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visit instapaper.com/notes and click the extension icon to export your highlights from Instapaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension that adds a button to your browser toolbar which, when clicked, will export your Instapaper highlights as an HTML page (with JSON output included).
